pages.text: $(item)Mulch$() is made using a $(item)Compost Bin$() and can be placed on $(item)Farmland$().$(p)$(item)Mulch$() can be placed on either $(item)Farmland$() or a plant growing on top to create a temporary $(item)Mulched Farmland$().
$(item)Mulched Farmland$() is resistant to being trampled and plants growing on top will periodically receive a $(thing)bone meal effect$() for the duration of the mulch effect.
